com.github.cuter44.wxpay.servlet

类 JSAPISigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.github.cuter44.wxpay.servlet.JSAPISigner
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class JSAPISigner
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Accept order info and sign, Then return json for used in getBrandWCPayRequest Notice that currently this interface supported the min set of featured parameters, and handles data roughly. In most case you may rewrite one to fit your situation. DO NOT use this servlet in a multi-instance environment, due to this servlet use a static appid and secret read from the config file. 
        Sign JSAPI pay request
    POST /jsapi-signer.api

    Params
    body        :string , description of goods
    total_fee   :double , fee in CNY Yuan
    openid      :string , client's openid

    Response
    Content-Type: application/json
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
